unnormalised: Urban planning in India faces unique challenges. Slum rehabilitation, especially post-monsoon (like after 15/07/2024), requires robust policy. Consider the Dharavi model in Mumbai. We need integrated approaches, not just flyovers like the one opened at 11:00 hrs, 22/12/2023 near AIIMS, Delhi. PPP models should prioritize citizen needs. Effective land use data collection (deadline 30/09/2024) is crucial for equitable resource allocation and planned development like in Gandhinagar.
normalised: Urban planning in India faces unique challenges. Slum rehabilitation, especially post monsoon (like after fifteenth july two thousand and twenty four), requires robust policy. Consider the Dharavi model in Mumbai. We need integrated approaches, not just flyovers like the one opened at eleven zero zero hours, twenty second december two thousand and twenty three near A I I M S, Delhi. P P P models should prioritize citizen needs. Effective land use data collection (deadline thirtieth september two thousand and twenty four) is crucial for equitable resource allocation and planned development like in Gandhinagar.
